code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CatApp(){const[statusCode,setStatusCode]=React.useState(200);const[items,setItems]=React.useState(null);const[err,setErr]=React.useState(null);const isValidStatusCode=code=>/^[1-5][0-9]{2}$/.test(code);React.useEffect(()=>{if(!isValidStatusCode(statusCode)){setErr('Invalid Status Code !!');setItems(null);return;}fetch("".concat(statusCode)).then(res=>{if(!res.ok){throw new Error('Network response failure');}return res.blob();}).then(blob=>{const imgUrl=URL.createObjectURL(blob);setItems(imgUrl);}).catch(error=>{setErr('Fetch data failure');setItems(null);console.error('Error fetching item:',error);});},[statusCode]);const inputChange=e=>{const val=e.target.value;setStatusCode(val);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Check Your Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"statusInput",children:" Enter HTTP Status Code: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"statusInput",value:statusCode,onChange:inputChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[err&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error: ",err]}),items&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:items,alt:"Cat status code depiction for ".concat(statusCode)})]})]});}export default CatApp;
